Function reference version 0.0.1

Create flextable

flextable
Create a flextable object

Headers

Add or modify flextable`s headers

add_header
Add a row of labels in headers
set_header_df
Set flextable's header rows
set_header_labels
Set flextable's headers labels

Manage flextable layout

autofit
Adjusts cell widths and heights
dim_pretty
Calculate pretty dimensions
dim.flextable
Get flextable dimensions
height
Set flextable rows height
merge_h
Merge flextable cells horizontally
merge_none
Delete flextable merging informations
merge_v
Merge flextable cells vertically
width
Set flextable columns width

Format flextable

Modify flextable`s formatting properties, apply theme functions.

bg
Set background color
bold
Set font weight
border
Set borders
color
Set font color
padding
Set paddings
style
Set flextable style
theme_tron_legacy
Apply tron legacy theme
theme_tron
Apply tron theme
theme_vanilla
Apply vanilla theme
theme_zebra
Apply zebra theme

Content

Define flextable`s content

display
Define flextable displayed values

Helper functions

empty
Delete flextable content

Output functions

tabwid
htmlwidget for flextable
write_docx
Microsoft Word table
write_pptx
Microsoft PowerPoint table
